xplane_types.py

Defines X-Plane data types.

Summary
xplane_types.pyDefines X-Plane data types.

firstAnimatedParentReturns the first parent in hierarchy that is animated.

XPlaneBoneA Bone.
Properties
armatureA XPlaneArmature.
Functions
__init__Finds the armature, runs XPlaneObject.getCoordinates and XPlaneObject.getAnimations.
getMatrixOverrides XPlaneObject.getMatrix as bone matrices need to be taken from PoseBones.
getMatrixRest
getLocalRestReturns the local coordinates of the bones rest position.
getWorldRestReturns the world coordinates of the bones rest position.
getVectorsReturns the objects axis vectors.
getCoordinatesStores the local and world coordinates and the vectors of the object in rest position (frame 1).
updateoverrides XPlaneObject.update, but does nothing at all for same reason as in XPlaneObject.update.
XPlaneArmatureA Armature
Functions
__init__Runs XPlaneObject.getCoordinates and currently not XPlaneObject.getAnimations.
getPoseBoneReturns a Blender bones PoseBone.

Properties
indices
material
faces
attributes

cockpitAttributes
Functions
__init__Defines basic attributes and cockpitAttributes, Creates material, runs getManipulatorAttributes, <getLightLevelAttributes>, XPlaneObject.getCoordinates and XPlaneObject.getAnimations.
getManipulatorAttributesDefines Manipulator attributes in cockpitAttributes based on settings in XPlaneManipulator.

Properties
object
texture
uv_name

Functions

XPlaneKeyframe

A Keyframe.

Summary
Properties
object
value
dataref
translation
rotation
scale
index
Functions
__init__Caclulates translation, rotation and scale.

Properties

object

XPlaneObjectThe XPlaneObject this keyframe belongs to.

value

floatContains the Dataref value in this keyframe.

dataref

stringThe Path of the dataref this keyframe refers to.

translation

list[x,y,z] With translations of the object relative to the object rest position (frame 1).

rotation

list[x,y,z] With rotation angles of the object in this keyframe.

scale

list[x,y,z] With scale of the object in this keyframe.

index

intThe index of this keyframe in the object keyframe list.

Functions

__init__

def __init__(self,
keyframe,
index,
dataref,
obj)

Caclulates translation, rotation and scale.

Parameters

keyframeA Blender keyframe
int indexThe index of this keyframe in the object keyframe list.
string datarefPath of the dataref this keyframe refers to.
XPlaneObject objA XPlaneObject.

XPlaneAttributes

A Wrapper for OrderedDict that stores a collection of XPlaneAttribute.

Summary
Functions
orderSorts items by weight.
addAdds an attribute to the dict.
getReturns an attribute.
setOverwrites an existing attribute.

Functions

order

def order(self)

Sorts items by weight.

add

def add(self,
attr)

Adds an attribute to the dict.

Parameters

attrA XPlaneAttribute

get

def get(self,
name)

Returns an attribute.

Parameters

string nameName of the attribute

Returns

a XPlaneAttribute or None

set

def set(self,
attr)

Overwrites an existing attribute.

Paramters

attrA XPlaneAttribute

XPlaneAttribute

An Attribute

Summary
Functions
__init__
addValueAdds a value to the attribute.
addValuesAdd multiple values at once to the attribute.
setValueOverwrites the current attribute value.
getValueReturn the current value of the attribute.
getValues

Functions

__init__

def __init__(self,  
name,  
value =  None,
weight =  0)

Parameters

string nameName of the attribute
mixed value(default = None) Either a string or boolean
int weight(default = 0) The attribute weight.  Bigger weight will write the attribute later in the OBJ file.

addValue

def addValue(self,
value)

Adds a value to the attribute.

Parameters

mixed valueEither a string or boolean

addValues

def addValues(self,
values)

Add multiple values at once to the attribute.

Parameters

list valuesA list of values.

setValue

def setValue(self,  
value,  
i =  0)

Overwrites the current attribute value.

Parameters

mixed valueEither a string or boolean
int i(default = 0) The index of the value.

getValue

def getValue(self,  
i =  0)

Return the current value of the attribute.

Paramters

int i(default = 0) The index of the value.

Returns

mixedThe value

getValues

def getValues(self)

Returns

listAll values of the attribute.

XPlaneObject

A basic object

Sublcasses

XPlaneBone XPlaneArmature XPlaneLight XPlaneLine XPlanePrimitive

Summary
Properties
objectThe blender object this XPlaneObject refers to.
name
type
children
parent
animations
datarefs
bakeMatrix
location
angle
scale
locationLocal
angleLocal
scaleLocal
vectors
id
weight
Functions
__init__
firstAnimatedParentReturns the first parent in hierarchy that is animated.
getAnimationsStores all animations of object or another Blender object in animations.
getMatrixReturns the matrix of object.
getVectorsReturns the objects axis vectors.
getLocalReturns the local coordinates of the object.
getWorldReturns the world coordinates of the object.
getRelativeReturns the coordinates of the object relative to another XPlaneObject.
updateA wrapper function to update the display/coordinates of the object after switching of frames.
getCoordinatesStores the local and world coordinates and the vectors of the object in rest position (frame 1).
animatedChecks if the object is animated.
hasAnimAttributesChecks if the object has animation attributes.
getWeight

Properties

object

The blender object this XPlaneObject refers to.

name

stringName of this object.  The same as the object name.

type

stringType of the object.  Mostly the same as the object type.

children

listAll child XPlaneObjects.

parent

XPlaneObjectThe parent XPlaneObject.

animations

dictThe keys are the dataref paths and the values are lists of XPlaneKeyframes.

datarefs

dictThe keys are the dataref paths and the values are references to XPlaneDatarefs.

bakeMatrix

MatrixThe matrix this object was baked with.  See XPlaneMesh.getBakeMatrix for more information.

location

list[x,y,z] With world location

angle

list[x,y,z] With world angle

scale

list[x,y,z] With world scale

locationLocal

list[x,y,z] With local location

angleLocal

list[x,y,z] With local angle

scaleLocal

list[x,y,z] With local scale

vectors

Vector of vectors(vx,vy,vz) With orientation of each rotational axis.

id

intA unique id

weight

int(default = 0) The object weight.  Higher weight will write the object later in OBJ.

Functions

__init__

def __init__(self,  
object,  
parent =  None)

Parameters

objectA Blender object
XPlaneObject parent(default=None) A XPlaneObject or None.

firstAnimatedParent

def firstAnimatedParent(self,  
child =  None)

Returns the first parent in hierarchy that is animated.

Parameters

XPlaneObject child(default=None) Used internally for recursion.  If given the search starts upwards from this XPlaneObject.

Returns

XPlaneObjectThe first parent in hierarchy that is animated or None if no animated parent could be found.

getAnimations

def getAnimations(self,  
object =  None,
bone =  None)

Stores all animations of object or another Blender object in animations.

Parameters

object(default=None) A Blender object.  If given animation of this object will be stored.

getMatrix

def getMatrix(self,  
world =  False)

Returns the matrix of object.  This is a simple wrapper function and becomes more complex in inheritted classes.  So please use it instead of directly accessing object matrices.

Parameters

bool world(default=False) True if the world matrix should be returned.

getVectors

def getVectors(self)

Returns the objects axis vectors.  Thats the orientation of each rotational axis.  It takes the bakeMatrix into consideration.  Uses XPlaneCoords.vectorsFromMatrix.

Returns

Vector of vectors(vx,vy,vz)

getLocal

def getLocal(self,  
isAnimation = False)

Returns the local coordinates of the object.  Uses getMatrix, XPlaneCoords.convertMatrix and XPlaneCoords.fromMatrix.

Returns

dict{‘location’:[x,y,z],’rotation’:[x,y,z],’scale’:[x,y,z],’angle’:[x,y,z]} Whith local coordinates.

getWorld

def getWorld(self)

Returns the world coordinates of the object.  Uses getMatrix, XPlaneCoords.convertMatrix and XPlaneCoords.fromMatrix.

Returns

dict{‘location’:[x,y,z],’rotation’:[x,y,z],’scale’:[x,y,z],’angle’:[x,y,z]} Whith world coordinates.

getRelative

def getRelative(self,
to)

Returns the coordinates of the object relative to another XPlaneObject.  Uses getMatrix, XPlaneCoords.relativeConvertedMatrix and XPlaneCoords.fromMatrix.

Returns

dict{‘location’:[x,y,z],’rotation’:[x,y,z],’scale’:[x,y,z],’angle’:[x,y,z]} Whith relative coordinates.

update

def update(self)

A wrapper function to update the display/coordinates of the object after switching of frames.  Since Blender r35028 this function does nothing anymore, as updating seems to be done by Blender already.

getCoordinates

def getCoordinates(self)

Stores the local and world coordinates and the vectors of the object in rest position (frame 1).  Uses getLocal, getWorld and getVectors.

animated

def animated(self)

Checks if the object is animated.

Returns

boolTrue if object is animated, False if not.

hasAnimAttributes

def hasAnimAttributes(self)

Checks if the object has animation attributes.

Returns

boolTrue if object has animtaion attributes, False if not.

getWeight

def getWeight(self)

Returns

intThe weight of this object.

XPlaneBone

A Bone.

Extends

XPlaneObject

Summary
Properties
armatureA XPlaneArmature.
Functions
__init__Finds the armature, runs XPlaneObject.getCoordinates and XPlaneObject.getAnimations.
getMatrixOverrides XPlaneObject.getMatrix as bone matrices need to be taken from PoseBones.
getMatrixRest
getLocalRestReturns the local coordinates of the bones rest position.
getWorldRestReturns the world coordinates of the bones rest position.
getVectorsReturns the objects axis vectors.
getCoordinatesStores the local and world coordinates and the vectors of the object in rest position (frame 1).
updateoverrides XPlaneObject.update, but does nothing at all for same reason as in XPlaneObject.update.

Properties

armature

A XPlaneArmature.

Functions

__init__

def __init__(self,  
object,  
parent =  None)

Finds the armature, runs XPlaneObject.getCoordinates and XPlaneObject.getAnimations.

Parameters

objectA Blender object
XPlaneObject parent(default=None) A XPlaneObject or None.

getMatrix

def getMatrix(self,  
world =  False)

Overrides XPlaneObject.getMatrix as bone matrices need to be taken from PoseBones.  Uses XPlaneArmature.getPoseBone.

getMatrixRest

def getMatrixRest(self,  
world =  False)

getLocalRest

def getLocalRest(self)

Returns the local coordinates of the bones rest position.  Uses getMatrix, XPlaneCoords.convertMatrix and XPlaneCoords.fromMatrix.

Returns

dict{‘location’:[x,y,z],’rotation’:[x,y,z],’scale’:[x,y,z],’angle’:[x,y,z]} Whith local coordinates.

getWorldRest

def getWorldRest(self)

Returns the world coordinates of the bones rest position.  Uses getMatrix, XPlaneCoords.convertMatrix and XPlaneCoords.fromMatrix.

Returns

dict{‘location’:[x,y,z],’rotation’:[x,y,z],’scale’:[x,y,z],’angle’:[x,y,z]} Whith world coordinates.

getVectors

def getVectors(self)

Returns the objects axis vectors.  Thats the orientation of each rotational axis.  It takes the <bakeMatrix> into consideration.  Uses XPlaneCoords.vectorsFromMatrix.

Returns

Vector of vectors(vx,vy,vz)

getCoordinates

def getCoordinates(self)

Stores the local and world coordinates and the vectors of the object in rest position (frame 1).  Uses <getLocal>, <getWorld> and getVectors.

update

def update(self)

overrides XPlaneObject.update, but does nothing at all for same reason as in XPlaneObject.update.

Extends

XPlaneObject

Functions

parent =  None)

getPoseBone

name)

Returns a Blender bones PoseBone.

Parameters

Returns

PoseBoneA Blender PoseBone or None, if PoseBone could not be found.

XPlaneLight

A Light

Extends

XPlaneObject

Summary
Properties
indices
color
energy
lightType
size
lightName
params
dataref
Functions
__init__

Properties

indices

list[start,end] Starting end ending indices for this light.

color

list[r,g,b] Color taken from the original Blender light.  Can change depending on lightType.

energy

floatEnergy taken from Blender light.

lightType

stringType of the light taken from XPlaneLampSettings.

size

floatSize of the light taken from XPlaneLampSettings.

lightName

stringName of the light taken from XPlaneLampSettings.

params

stringParameters taken from XPlaneLampSettings.

dataref

stringDataref path taken from XPlaneLampSettings.

Functions

__init__

def __init__(self,  
object,  
parent =  None)

Parameters

objectA Blender object
XPlaneObject parent(default=None) A XPlaneObject or None.

XPlaneLine

A Line/Curve This class is not in use yet.

Extends

XPlaneObject

XPlanePrimitive

A Mesh object.

Extends

XPlaneObject

Summary
Properties
indices
material
faces
attributes
reseters
cockpitAttributes
Functions
__init__Defines basic attributes and cockpitAttributes, Creates material, runs getManipulatorAttributes, <getLightLevelAttributes>, XPlaneObject.getCoordinates and XPlaneObject.getAnimations.
getManipulatorAttributesDefines Manipulator attributes in cockpitAttributes based on settings in XPlaneManipulator.

Properties

indices

list[start,end] Starting end ending indices for this object.

material

XPlaneMaterialA XPlaneMaterial

faces

XPlaneFacesInstance of XPlaneFaces with all face of this mesh.  Currently not in use.  This should be used when commands will work on a per face basis.

attributes

dictObject attributes that will be turned into commands with XPlaneCommands.

reseters

dictObject attribute reseters that will be turned into commands with XPlaneCommands.

cockpitAttributes

dictObject attributes for cockpit settings, that will be turned into commands with XPlaneCommands.

Functions

__init__

def __init__(self,  
object,  
parent =  None)

Defines basic attributes and cockpitAttributes, Creates material, runs getManipulatorAttributes, <getLightLevelAttributes>, XPlaneObject.getCoordinates and XPlaneObject.getAnimations.

Parameters

objectA Blender object
XPlaneObject parent(default=None) A XPlaneObject or None.

getManipulatorAttributes

def getManipulatorAttributes(self)

Defines Manipulator attributes in cockpitAttributes based on settings in XPlaneManipulator.

XPlaneMaterial

A Material

Summary
Properties
object
texture
uv_name
name
attributes
Functions
__init__Defines the attributes by reading the original Blender material from the object.
getLightLevelAttributesDefines light level attributes in attributes based on settings in XPlaneObjectSettings.

Properties

object

XPlaneObjectA XPlaneObject

texture

stringPath to the texture in use for this material, or None if no texture is present.  This property is no longer important as textures are defined by layer.

uv_name

stringName of the uv layer to be used for texture UVs.

name

stringName of the Blender material.

attributes

dictMaterial attributes that will be turned into commands with XPlaneCommands.

Functions

__init__

def __init__(self,
object)

Defines the attributes by reading the original Blender material from the object.  Also adds custom attributes to attributes.

Parameters

objectA Blender object

getLightLevelAttributes

def getLightLevelAttributes(self,
mat)

Defines light level attributes in attributes based on settings in XPlaneObjectSettings.

XPlaneFace

A mesh face.  This class is just a data wrapper used by XPlaneFaces.

Summary
Properties
vertices
normals
indices
uvs
smooth

Properties

vertices

list of vectors[v1,v2,v3] The vertices forming the face.

normals

list of vectors[n1,n2,n3] The normals of each vertice in vertices.

indices

list[i1,i2,i3] The indices for each vertice in vertices.

uvs

list of vectors[(u1,v1),(u2,v2),(u3,v3)] With UV coordinates for each vertice in vertices.

smooth

bool(default=False) True if face is smooth shaded, False if it is flat shaded.

XPlaneFaces

A collection of XPlaneFace.

Summary

faces
Functions

def getBakeMatrix(self,
obj)
Returns the bake matrix of a XPlaneObject.
@staticmethod def vectorsFromMatrix(matrix)
Returns directional vectors from a given matrix.
@staticmethod def convertMatrix(matrix,  
invert =  False)
Converts a matrix using conversionMatrix.
@staticmethod def fromMatrix(matrix,  
scaleLoc =  False,
localRotation = None)
Returns coordinates for a matrix.
def relativeConvertedMatrix(child_matrix,  
parent_matrix,  
invert =  False)
Get’s the relative and converted matrix between a child and a parent objects matrixes.
Settings for Blender lamps.

A collection of XPlaneFace.
